subject: Payment Issue
message: I'm having trouble with the payment system. It keeps showing an error when I try to book a spot.

subject: Spot Not Available
message: I booked a spot but when I arrived, it was already occupied by another car. This is very frustrating.

responses.message: We apologize for this inconvenience. We're investigating the issue and will get back to you within 24 hours.

subject: App Not Working
message: The mobile app keeps crashing when I try to view my bookings. I've tried reinstalling but the problem persists.

responses.message: This issue has been resolved in our latest app update. Please update your app to version 2.1.0.
